content.title: Dissection Medical Management
content.definition: Impulse control: IV beta-blockers first to HR 60, then vasodilators for SBP 100-120. Pain control with opioids.
content.statement: Dissection Medical Management is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Dissection Medical Management helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.

explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Dissection Medical Management.
